author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN LATER TODAY...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN LATER TODAY... As of 2:00 AM MST Tue Sep 02 the center of Twelve-E was located near 17.6, -106.8 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN LATER TODAY... As of 2:00 AM MST Tue Sep 02 the center of Twelve-E was located near 17.6, -106.8 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Twelve-E (EP2/EP122025)
